response.original_title: Professional Fighters League Playoffs PFL 9: Harrison vs Jimdrova
response.overview: The PFL 9 mixed martial arts event for the 2022 season of the Professional Fighters League was held on Saturday, August 20, 2022, at the Copper Box Arena in London, England. This was the start of the playoffs for the Women's Lightweight and Featherweight divisions.
response.title: Professional Fighters League Playoffs PFL 9: Harrison vs Jimdrova
